sections.text: of act.The purpose of the Health Care Facility Licensure Act and the Nebraska Nursing Home Act is to protect the public health, safety, and welfare by providing for the licensure of health care facilities and health care services in the State of Nebraska and for the development, establishment, and enforcement of basic standards for such facilities and services.SourceLaws 2000, LB 819, ยง 2.Cross ReferencesNebraska Nursing Home Act, see section 71-6037.

71-402.Purpose of act.

The purpose of the Health Care Facility Licensure Act and the Nebraska Nursing Home Act is to protect the public health, safety, and welfare by providing for the licensure of health care facilities and health care services in the State of Nebraska and for the development, establishment, and enforcement of basic standards for such facilities and services.

SourceLaws 2000, LB 819, ยง 2.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Nursing Home Act, see section 71-6037.
